recipesJson.name: PBJ Waffle - Blueberry
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: This is a blueberry waffle with blueberry jam and peanutbutter i make these all the time so i tried replicating it . off the shake i did pretty well . A steep should make this much better . i’m using blueberry muffin and yellow cake as the waffle with a little waffle to give it some crisp also some white cake to fluff it up a bit . the blueberry jam and blueberry gummy candy make up for the jelly and the peanutbutter .. well you know why that’s there lol . If everyone likes this one i will come out with a strawberry version
